```{r setup, include=FALSE}
install.packages("SmartEDA")
load("~/Ontario-Lake-Fish-Classification/processed_AnalysisData.Rdata")
library(SmartEDA)
```

```{r}
fishes <- processed_data$fishNum
for (fish in fishes) {
  plot(processed_data[processed_data$fishNum == fish,]$pingNumber, processed_data[processed_data$fishNum == fish,]$Target_true_depth)
}

plot(processed_data[processed_data$fishNum == "LWF014",]$pingNumber, processed_data[processed_data$fishNum == "LWF014",]$Target_true_depth)
```
